channel.title: GSFF2023 on Reviews Per Minute
channel.description: Recent content in GSFF2023 on Reviews Per Minute

item.title: 3 Dialogues About the Future (2022) - 14 mins
item.description: A reflection on how machine learning reduces the human experience to mere data points.

item.title: A.I. Poetries of Female and Non-Female Beings in Gas Stations at Night (Poezii A.I. Despre Femei și Non-Femei în Benzinării, Noptea) (2022) - 19 mins
item.description: Pixelated CCTV camera footage and predictive text poetry highlight the paucity of meaning at the heart of machine learning.

item.title: Hysteresis (2021) - 6 mins
item.description: Machine learning flourishes over human dance.

item.title: Theta (2023) - 12 mins
item.description: A car’s internal monologue reveals the emptiness of a world without meaning.

item.title: Traces of Things (2018) - 10 mins
item.description: Sepia images blur into grotesque mockery of a photographic archive.

item.title: Aphonia (Afonia) (2022) - 12 mins
item.description: Connection and community are explored through some deep performances from child actors.

item.title: backflip (2022) - 13 mins
item.description: A reflection on machine learning through the medium of backflips. Hilarious and poignant.

item.title: Bellsmyre Caledonia (2022) - 6 mins
item.description: Charming rumination on thinking under lockdown.

item.title: Corrupted (Corrupto) (2022) - 15 mins
item.description: Incredible experiment with the form of digital cinema that uses distortion to convey something important.

item.title: Ice Merchants (2022) - 14 mins
item.description: Stunning hand-drawn animation anchors this vertiginous story about life and survival on the edge.

item.title: Warsha (ورشة) (2021) - 16 mins
item.description: A beautiful film on solitude and freedom of expression. Seeking silence to be who you are.
